title: "General Motors Licenses Neural Network Tech from National Lab"
excerpt: "General Motors is set to tap an artificial intelligence software system from Oak Ridge National Laboratory for its driver assistance systems technology and future-facing automotive designs. The automaker is the first entity to commercially license the Multinode Evolutionary Neural Networks for Deep Learning,"
